name: 🏠 [picture of a house]
description:
When you have sleeping problems, and you're haunted by nightmares, maybe all you have to do is ask your friends for help! Chat with your friends in your RPG-like city, and then use their gifts as power ups to make it through your space-shooter nightmares! 

Arrows and spacebar to interact.

---- 

Cuando tenés problemas para dormir y sos perseguido por pesadillas, quizás todo lo que tenés que hacer es pedirle ayuda a tus amigos! Charlá con tus amigos en tu ciudad RPG, y usá los regalos que te den como power ups para poder superar tus pesadillas de navecitas!

Flechas y barra espaciadora para interactuar.

----

Made for Global Game Jam 2019, theme "What's home to you?"

Mer Grazzini - Programming

Fausto Lezcano - Visual art

Dr. Feelgod, Extreinsh, Fachipa, jbpn456 - Music & SFX
